title: Caress Body Wash, Pure Embrace 12 oz
features: Caress Pure Embrace is a silkening body wash delicately perfumed with fragrant white flowers and almond oil
Infused with fragrant white flowers and almond oil
Caress Pure Embrace body wash blends rich lather and sophisticated fragrances
Gently cleanses and leaves skin delicately fragrant, beautifully soft

All Caress fragrances are crafted by the world’s best perfumers. Caress body wash and beauty bar fragrances are crafted by the world’s best perfumers to transform your daily shower into an indulging experience that will make you feel special every day
description: Want to feel irresistible every day? Revel in the feeling of soft silky skin with Caress Pure Embrace Body Wash. Infused with a symphony of white flower extracts and almond oil, indulge yourself in its luxurious lather, composed by the world’s best perfume experts. Caress Pure Embrace is an indulgent and pampering body wash that blends rich, luxurious lather with expertly crafted fine fragrance. It is the body wash that Gently cleanses and leaves skin delicately fragrant, beautifully soft. Sink into the silky touch of Caress Pure Embrace, a delicately scented body wash infused with the scent of fragrant white flowers and pampering almond oil. White floral notes tantalize the senses before opening up to seductive base notes of vanilla to round out and soften the scent to create a beautifully complex perfume that lingers on your skin. Make your daily shower one to remember as you delight in the fine fragrance of white flowers infused with almond oil and enjoy the lavish lather of Caress Pure Embrace. Indulge in this exquisite combination of fragrance and softness meant to wrap you in a soft embrace that delivers irresistibly silky and exquisitely perfumed skin. Caress body wash and beauty bar fragrances are crafted by the world’s best perfumers to transform your daily shower into an indulging experience that will make you feel special every day?
